DtScriptedTaskMetaData.myDescription: Sweep for mines along a route and disarm (and delete) those within range. The error rate is the percentage chance of failing to deactivate a mine within range.

myVariables.item: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="8"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>sweep_route</myVariableName> <myType>simulationobject</myType> <myLabel>Sweep Route:</myLabel> <myToolTip>The route along which to sweep for mines.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>Routes</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData>DtRoutesFilter</myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="8"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>sense_range</myVariableName> <myType>range</myType> <myLabel>Sensing Range</myLabel> <myToolTip>The range from the entity at which mines can be disarmed.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>300</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>0</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="8"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>miss_chance</myVariableName> <myType>double</myType> <myLabel>Disarm Failure Probability (%):</myLabel> <myToolTip>Probability that a mine within range will not be deactivated.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>0</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>0</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>
